languages.text: "Я хочу оставить его как есть. Наверняка у ритуала, в котором он участвовал, было определенное предназначение..."

traits.locale_text: "Я хочу оставить его как есть. Наверняка у ритуала, в котором он участвовал, было определенное предназначение..."

languages.text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."
languages.original_text: "Я хочу оставить его как есть. Наверняка у ритуала, в котором он участвовал, было определенное предназначение..."

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."
"I'd rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."
"I'd rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."
"I'd rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."
"I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."
"I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

languages.text: "Ich möchte ihn lieber lassen, wo er ist. Was das auch für ein Ritual ist, an dem er da beteiligt ist, es muss einen Zweck haben ..."
languages.original_text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte ihn lieber lassen, wo er ist. Was das auch für ein Ritual ist, an dem er da beteiligt ist, es muss einen Zweck haben ..."

languages.text: « Je préfère le laisser tel qu'il est. Le rituel auquel il a pris part doit bien avoir une utilité... »
languages.original_text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère le laisser tel qu'il est. Le rituel auquel il a pris part doit bien avoir une utilité... »

languages.text: “我宁愿把他就这样放在这里。他参与的这个仪式，肯定出于某种特别的目的……”
languages.original_text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

traits.locale_text: “我宁愿把他就这样放在这里。他参与的这个仪式，肯定出于某种特别的目的……”

languages.text: 「あいつはこのままにしておいてやろう。関わっていた全ての儀式に、何らかの目的があったのだろうしな…」
languages.original_text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

traits.locale_text: 「このままにしておいた方がいい。関わった全ての儀式に目的があるのだろう…」

languages.text: «Prefiero dejarlo como está. Debe de haber un propósito para el ritual en el que haya participado...».
languages.original_text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

traits.locale_text: «Prefiero dejarlo como está. Debe de haber un propósito para el ritual en el que haya participado...»

languages.text: "Onu böyle bırakalım bence. Alet edildiği ayin her ne ise, bir amaca hizmet ediyor olmalı."
languages.original_text: "I would rather leave him as he is. There must be a purpose to whatever ritual he has taken part in..."

traits.locale_text: "Onu olduğu gibi bırakma taraftarıyım. Alet edildiği ayinde bir amaca hizmet ediyor olmalı..."
